==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = Melee Combo
|desc_1 = Performs 2 or 3 melee attacks, dealing '''60% ATK''', '''60% ATK''', '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
|name_2 = Single Shot
|desc_2 = Fires a projectile at the player, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
|name_3 = Elastic Smash
|desc_3 = Transforms into a {{w|slinky}} and leaps forward 1 to 4 times, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
|name_4 = Stressed State
|desc_4 = Periodically enters a stressed state, during which it will gain a {{Geo}} [[Shield/Enemy|shield]] and unleashes Stonefalls, repeatedly smashing down and causing quakes that deal '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Geo DMG}}.

The shield is weakest to [[Blunt Attack]]s. A single [[Arkhe]] attack, {{Pneuma}} or {{Ousia}}, will also instantly destroy the shield. Once the shield is broken, the Breacher Primus will become paralyzed for a long period of time.

Once paralyzed, the exposed core counts as a [[Weak Point]].
{{Elemental Shield Data|Geo|6}}
|file_4_2 = Large Shatterstone Breacher Primus Stressed State 2
}}
